name: The Construct
description:
New character - The Construct! 

 v0.9.99 hotfix - challenge relics no longer considered starter rarity.

NEW CONTENT
- Added Challenge Mode level 1+2 (in Config Menu).

EXPANSION (BETA - Unlock in Config Menu)
- Massive rework of Overheat mechanic.
- Added some new cards and improved old ones.

REBALANCING
- Fierce Bash 8->9 damage.
- Hyper Beam 2->3 cost, 3->2 Dazed.
- Metal Shell and Reinforce rarities swapped.
- Analyze draw 1->2 cards.
- Backup now Exhausts.
- Flak Barrage hits 4 times and upgrades to Cycle.
- Claw Grip rarity Boss->Rare.
- Foam Finger now only works for 3 turns.
- Foam Finger rarity Rare->Uncommon.
- Shield Burst damage calculation fixed.  

Want to test some experimental new cards?
Look in the config menu!
